Featured Community NEW Feeds Lists Forums Contributors Games NEW Stars Leaderboard NEW Calendar 7 Edit this Page Edit Information Primary Details Cover Image Cast Credits Crew Credits Report Details Related Articles Ha Dong QN Name: Ha Dong QN Native name: 하동균 Also Known as: Ha Dong Gyun Nationality: South Korean Gender: Male Born: June 28, 1980 Age: 45 Ha Dong Gyun, also known as Ha Dong QN, is a South Korean singer-songwriter. He debuted in 2002 as a member of the short-lived boy band 7Dayz, before joining the boy band Wanted in 2004. As a solo singer, he has released two albums: Stand Alone (2006) and Another Corner (2008), and three extended plays: Mark (2012), Word (2014), and Polygon (2017).
